file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://apirest.isendpro.com/cgi-bin
  - url: http://apirest.isendpro.com/cgi-bin
info:
  x-ballerina-display:
      label: iSendPro
      iconPath: "icon.png"
  contact:
    email: support@isendpro.com
    name: iSendPro Support Team
    url: https://www.isendpro.com/
    x-twitter: isendpro
  description: |
    This is a generated connector for [iSendPro v1.1.1](https://www.isendpro.com/docs/?type=7) OpenAPI specification.
    [1] List of features:
    - sending SMS to one or more recipients,
    - HLR lookup,
    - recovery of campaign summaries,
    - directory management,
    - addition to blacklist.
    - counting of the number of characters in SMS

    [2] To use this API you must:
    - Create an iSendPro account on https://isendpro.com/
    - Credit your account
        - Note: obtaining a test credit possible under certain conditions
    - Write down your account key (keyid)
      - It will be essential for you to use the API
      - You can find it in the section my "account", sub-section "my API"
    - Configure IP control
      - IP control can be configured in the my "account" section, "my API" sub-section
      - This is a whitelist system, you need to enter the IPs used to call the API
      - You can also completely disable IP control
  title: API iSendPro
  version: 1.1.1
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - messaging
  x-logo:
    url: https://en.isendpro.com/img/logo-isendpro.png
  x-origin:
    - format: openapi
      url: https://apirest.isendpro.com/isendpro.json
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: isendpro.com
  x-ballerina-init-description: | 
    The connector initialization doesn't require setting the API credentials.
    Create an [iSendPro account](https://en.isendpro.com/signup.php) and obtain tokens by following this [guide](https://www.isendpro.com/docs/?type=7#prerequis_english)
    Operations require passing the token as a parameter.
paths:
  /campagne:
    get:
      description: |
        Returns the SMS sent over a given period according to a start date and an end date.

        The dates are in the format YYYY-MM-DD hh: mm.

        The campaign report file is in the form of a zip file + containing a csv file containing the details of the shipments.
      operationId: getCampaign
      parameters:
        - description: API key
          in: query
          name: keyid
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Must be "1"
          in: query
          name: rapportCampagne
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
            type: string
        - description: start date in format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm
          in: query
          name: date_deb
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: End date in format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm
          in: query
          name: date_fin
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                format: binary
                type: string
            file:
              schema:
                format: binary
                type: string
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            file:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Returns the SMS sent over a given period
      tags:
        - campaign
  /count:
    post:
      description: Counts the number of SMS necessary for a sending
      operationId: count
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CountRequest"
        description: Count request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CountResponse"
            etat:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      nb_character: "222"
                      nb_sms: "2"
                      tel: "0680010203"
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: "Count the number of characters."
      tags:
        - count
  /credit:
    get:
      description: |
        Returns the existing credit associated with the account.
      operationId: getCredit
      parameters:
        - description: API key
          in: query
          name: keyid
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
        - description: Type of response requested, 1 for euro, 2 for euro + quantity estimate
          in: query
          name: credit
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
              - "2"
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      credit: "10.0"
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CreditResponse"
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Get credit
      tags:
        - credit
  /dellistenoire:
    post:
      description: Remove a blacklisted number
      operationId: removeBlacklistNumber
      parameters:
        - description: API key
          in: query
          name: keyid
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
        - description: Must be "1"
          in: query
          name: delListeNoire
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
            type: string
        - description: Mobile number to be deleted
          in: query
          name: num
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BlacklistResponse"
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Add a blacklisted number
      tags:
        - addBlacklist
  /getlistenoire:
    post:
      description: Return a zipped csv file containing the blacklist
      operationId: getBlacklist
      parameters:
        - description: API key
          in: query
          name: keyid
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
        - description: Must be "1"
          in: query
          name: getListeNoire
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                format: binary
                type: string
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Return the blacklist
      tags:
        - getBlacklist
  /hlr:
    post:
      description: |
        Perform an HLR lookup on the numbers 
      operationId: validateNumber
      requestBody:
        description: HLR to be looked up
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/HLRrequest"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      etat:
                        operator: ORAN
                        tel: "0680010203"
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/HLRResponse"
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: Check the validity of a number
      tags:
        - hlr
  /repertoire:
    post:
      description: Create a new directory and return its identifier. This identifier can be used to add or delete numbers via the API.
      operationId: createDirectory
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorycreaterequest"
        description: Creation directory
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorycreatereponse"
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Create directory
      tags:
        - directory
    put:
      description: Adds or removes a list of numbers to an existing directory.
      operationId: updateDirectory
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/DirectoryUpdateRequest"
        description: Creation directory request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorymodifreponse"
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Update directory
      tags:
        - directory
  /setlistenoire:
    post:
      description: Adds a blacklisted number. Once added, requests to send marketing SMS to this number will be refused.
      operationId: addBlacklistNumber
      parameters:
        - description: API key
          in: query
          name: keyid
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
        - description: Must be "1"
          in: query
          name: setlisteNoire
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
            type: string
        - description: mobile number to be blacklisted
          in: query
          name: num
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BlacklistResponse"
          description: Successful response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Error
      summary: Add a blacklisted number.
      tags:
        - setListeNoire
  /shortlink:
    post:
      description: add a shortlink
      operationId: addShortlink
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ShortlinkRequest"
        description: add sub account request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ShortlinkResponse"
            exemple1:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      etat:
                        code: 250
                        message: The short link has been generated
                        shortlink: ww.sms.ht/aOHi
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: add a shortlink
      tags:
        - add shortlink
  /sms:
    post:
      description: Sending an SMS to a single recipient
      operationId: sendSms
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SmsUniqueRequest"
        description: SMS request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SMSResponse"
            etat:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      code: "0"
                      message: hello world!
                      tel: "0680010203"
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: Send a text message.
      tags:
        - sms
  /smsmulti:
    post:
      description: |
        Sending SMS to 1 or more recipients
      operationId: sendSmsMulti
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SMSRequest"
        description: SMS request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SMSResponse"
            etat:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      code: "0"
                      message: hello world!
                      tel: "0680010203"
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: Send multiple text messages
      tags:
        - sms
  /subaccount:
    post:
      description: Add sub account
      operationId: addSubAccount
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SubaccountAddRequest"
        description: add sub account request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SubaccountAddResponse"
            exemple1:
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    etat:
                      etat:
                        code: 230
                        subAccountId: 20150
                        subAccountKeyId: a9bc68fe78
                        subAccountLogin: marion.peltier.agence06
                        tel: The sub account has been added
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: Add a sub account
      tags:
        - add subaccount
    put:
      description: Update subaccount
      operationId: updateSubAccount
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SubaccountRequest"
        description: Update sub account request
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SubaccountResponse"
          description: Response OK
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
          description: Dysfonctionnement
      summary: Edit a subaccount
      tags:
        - Update subaccount
components:
  schemas:
    CountResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CountResponse_etat"
      type: object
    CountResponse_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CountResponse_etat_etat"
          type: array
    CountResponse_etat_etat:
      properties:
        nb_character:
          description: Number of characters
          type: string
        nb_sms:
          description: Number of sms needed
          type: string
        tel:
          description: Phone number
          type: string
    CountRequest:
      example:
        count: "1"
        emetteur: iSendPro
        keyid: YOUR_KEYID
        num: "0600123456"
        sms: BGood morning! Welcome to iSendPro!
      properties:
        count:
          default: "1"
          enum:
            - "1"
          type: string
        date_envoi:
          description: "Date sent in YYYY-MM-DD format hh: mm. This parameter is optional, if it is omitted, the sending is carried out immediately."
          type: string
        emetteur:
          description: |
             - The sender must be an alphanumeric string between 4 and 11 characters long.

             - The accepted characters are numbers between 0 and 9, letters between A and Z and space.

             - It cannot consist of only numbers.

             - For the modification of the transmitter and within the framework of commercial campaigns, the operators contractually impose to add at the end of the message the text "STOP XXXXX". As a result, the message sent cannot exceed a length of 148 characters instead of 160 characters, the "STOP" being added automatically.
          type: string
        gmt_zone:
          description: Time zone of the date sent
          enum:
            - Pacific/Midway
            - America/Adak
            - Etc/GMT+10
            - Pacific/Marquesas
            - Pacific/Gambier
            - America/Anchorage
            - America/Ensenada
            - Etc/GMT+8
            - America/Los_Angeles
            - America/Denver
            - America/Chihuahua
            - America/Dawson_Creek
            - America/Belize
            - America/Cancun
            - Chile/EasterIsland
            - America/Chicago
            - America/New_York
            - America/Havana
            - America/Bogota
            - America/Caracas
            - America/Santiago
            - America/La_Paz
            - Atlantic/Stanley
            - America/Campo_Grande
            - America/Goose_Bay
            - America/Glace_Bay
            - America/St_Johns
            - America/Araguaina
            - America/Montevideo
            - America/Miquelon
            - America/Godthab
            - America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires
            - America/Sao_Paulo
            - America/Noronha
            - Atlantic/Cape_Verde
            - Atlantic/Azores
            - Europe/Belfast
            - Europe/Dublin
            - Europe/Lisbon
            - Europe/London
            - Africa/Abidjan
            - Europe/Amsterdam
            - Europe/Belgrade
            - Europe/Brussels
            - Africa/Algiers
            - Africa/Windhoek
            - Asia/Beirut
            - Africa/Cairo
            - Asia/Gaza
            - Africa/Blantyre
            - Asia/Jerusalem
            - Europe/Minsk
            - Asia/Damascus
            - Europe/Moscow
            - Africa/Addis_Ababa
            - Asia/Tehran
            - Asia/Dubai
            - Asia/Yerevan
            - Asia/Kabul
            - Asia/Yekaterinburg
            - Asia/Tashkent
            - Asia/Kolkata
            - Asia/Katmandu
            - Asia/Dhaka
            - Asia/Novosibirsk
            - Asia/Rangoon
            - Asia/Bangkok
            - Asia/Krasnoyarsk
            - Asia/Hong_Kong
            - Asia/Irkutsk
            - Australia/Perth
            - Australia/Eucla
            - Asia/Tokyo
            - Asia/Seoul
            - Asia/Yakutsk
            - Australia/Adelaide
            - Australia/Darwin
            - Australia/Brisbane
            - Australia/Hobart
            - Asia/Vladivostok
            - Australia/Lord_Howe
            - Etc/GMT-11
            - Asia/Magadan
            - Pacific/Norfolk
            - Asia/Anadyr
            - Pacific/Auckland
            - Etc/GMT-12
            - Pacific/Chatham
            - Pacific/Tongatapu
            - Pacific/Kiritimati
          type: string
        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        nostop:
          description: If the message is not for commercial purposes, you can request to withdraw the obligation from the STOP. Once your request has been validated by our services, you can remove the STOP SMS mention by adding nostop = "1"
          type: string
        num:
          description: Telephone number in national (example 0680010203) or international (example 33680010203) format
          type: string
        numAzur:
          enum:
            - "1"
          type: string
        sms:
          description: Message to send to recipients. The message must be encoded in utf-8 format and contain only characters existing in the GSM alphabet. It is also possible to send (abroad only) SMS in UCS-2, see parameter ucs2 for more details.
          type: string
        smslong:
          default: "999"
          description: |
            The long SMS allows you to exceed the limit of 160 characters by sending a message consisting of
            of several SMS.
            Up to 6 concatenated SMS can be sent for a maximum total length of 918
            characters per message.
            For technical reasons, the limit per concatenated SMS is 153 characters.
            If the transmitter is changed, consider the automatic addition of 12 characters
            of the "STOP SMS".
            To send a smslong, you must add the smslong parameter to the calls. The value of SMS must be the maximum number of concatenated SMS allowed. In order not to have this error message and to obtain a dynamic calculation of the number of SMS then you must enter smslong = "999"
          enum:
            - "999"
          type: string
        tracker:
          description: "Le tracker doit être une chaine alphanumérique de moins de 50 caractères. Ce tracker sera ensuite renvoyé en paramètre des urls pour les retours des accusés de réception. "
          type: string
        ucs2:
          description: |
            It is also possible to send SMS in non-Latin alphabet (Russian, Chinese, Arabic, etc.) on
            numbers outside mainland France.
            To do this, the request should be encoded in UTF-8 format and contain the argument ucs2 = "1"
            Due to technical constraints, 1 unique SMS cannot exceed 70 characters (instead of
            of the usual 160) and in the case of long SMS, each SMS cannot exceed 67 characters.
          type: string
      required:
        - count
        - keyid
        - num
        - sms
      type: object
    CreditResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CreditResponse_etat"
      type: object
    CreditResponse_etat:
      properties:
        credit:
          description: Amount of credit remaining
          format: double
          type: number
        quantite:
          description: Credit equivalence in number of SMS to Metropolitan France.
          format: string
          type: string
    Error:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Erreur_etat"
      type: object
    Erreur_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Erreur_etat_etat"
          type: array
    Erreur_etat_etat:
      properties:
        code:
          description: Return code. See "return code table" in the appendix of the documentation
          format: string
          type: string
        message:
          description: Label associated with the return code
          format: string
          type: string
    HLRResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/HLRResponse_etat"
      type: object
    HLRResponse_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          description: list of returns
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/HLRResponse_etat_etat"
          type: array
      required:
        - etat
    HLRResponse_etat_etat:
      properties:
        operator:
          description: Associated operator (if valid number)
          type: string
        tel:
          description: Phone number concerned
          type: string
      required:
        - operator
        - tel
    HLRrequest:
      example:
        getHLR: "1"
        keyid: YOUR_KEYID
        num:
          - "06123456789"
          - "06345687899"
      properties:
        getHLR:
          default: "1"
          description: Must be "1"
          enum:
            - "1"
          type: string
        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        num:
          description: Phone number list
          items:
            description: Number in national, French or international format
            type: string
          type: array
      required:
        - getHLR
        - keyid
        - num
      type: object
    BlacklistResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/BlacklistResponse_etat"
      type: object
    BlacklistResponse_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/BlacklistResponse_etat_etat"
          type: array
      required:
        - etat
    BlacklistResponse_etat_etat:
      properties:
        listeNoire:
          description: Must be "OK"
          type: string
        tel:
          description: Telephone number to be blacklisted. National French or international format.
          type: string
      required:
        - listeNoire
        - tel
    Directorycreatereponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorycreatereponse_etat"
      type: object
    Directorycreatereponse_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorycreatereponse_etat_etat"
          type: array
    Directorycreatereponse_etat_etat:
      properties:
        code:
          description: Return code. See "return code table" in the appendix of the documentation
          type: string
        message:
          description: Label associated with the return code.
          type: string
        repertoireId:
          description: directoryId of the directory created.
          type: string
      required:
        - code
    Directorycreaterequest:
      example:
        keyid: YOUR_KEYID
        repertoireEdit: create
        repertoireNom: Repertoire de test
      properties:
        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        repertoireEdit:
          default: create
          description: Action à réaliser doit valoir "create" ici.
          enum:
            - create
          type: string
        repertoireNom:
          description: Nom du répertoire (libellé) à créer
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - repertoireEdit
        - repertoireNom
      type: object
    Directorymodifreponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorymodifreponse_etat"
      type: object
    Directorymodifreponse_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Directorymodifreponse_etat_etat"
          type: array
    Directorymodifreponse_etat_etat:
      description: Return code table. If successful, a separate return code for each number submitted.
      properties:
        code:
          description: Return code. See "return code table" in the appendix of the documentation
          type: string
        message:
          description: Label associated with the return code.
          type: string
        repertoireId:
          description: directory ID passed as argument during the call
          type: string
        tel:
          description: Phone number
          type: string
      required:
        - code
    DirectoryUpdateRequest:
      example:
        keyid: YOUR_KEYID
        num:
          - "06123456789"
          - "07123456789"
        repertoireEdit: add
        repertoireId: YOUR_DIRECTORY_ID
      properties:
        champ1:
          description: Contact names
          items:
            description: Contact names
            type: string
          type: array
        champ10:
          description: Champs I des contacts
          items:
            description: Champ I

        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        num:
          description: list of phone numbers to add or delete
          items:
            description: Telephone number in national or international format
            type: string
          type: array
        repertoireEdit:
          description: Action to perform, "add" for adding numbers, "del" for removing numbers
          enum:
            - add
            - del
          type: string
        repertoireId:
          description: directory ID of the target directory
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - num
        - repertoireEdit
        - repertoireId
      type: object
    SMSResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/SMSResponse_etat"
      type: object
    SMSResponse_etat:
      properties:
        etat:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/SMSResponse_etat_etat"
          type: array
    SMSResponse_etat_etat:
      properties:
        code:
          description: Return code. See "return code table" in the appendix of the documentation
          type: integer
        message:
          description: Label associated with the return code
          type: string
        smslong:
          description: Number of long SMS invoiced
          type: string
        tel:
          description: Phone number concerned
          type: string
    SMSRequest:
      example:
        emetteur: iSendPro
        keyid: YOUR_KEYID
        num:
          - "0600123456"
          - "0612345678"
        sms: Good morning! Welcome to iSendPro!
      properties:
        date_envoi:
          description: "Optional parameter, date of sending in YYYY-MM-DD hh: mm format"
          type: string
        emetteur:
          description: "The sender must be an alphanumeric string between 4 and 11 characters long. Accepted characters are numbers between 0 and 9, letters between A and Z and space. It cannot consist of only numbers. For modification from the sender and in the context of commercial campaigns, the operators contractually impose the following text to be added at the end of the message: STOP XXXXX Therefore, the message sent may not exceed a length of 148 characters instead of 160 characters, the STOP being added automatically. "
          type: string
        gmt_zone:
          description: Time zone of the date sent
          enum:
            - Pacific/Midway
            - America/Adak
            - Etc/GMT+10
            - Pacific/Marquesas
            - Pacific/Gambier
            - America/Anchorage
            - America/Ensenada
            - Etc/GMT+8
            - America/Los_Angeles
            - America/Denver
            - America/Chihuahua
            - America/Dawson_Creek
            - America/Belize
            - America/Cancun
            - Chile/EasterIsland
            - America/Chicago
            - America/New_York
            - America/Havana
            - America/Bogota
            - America/Caracas
            - America/Santiago
            - America/La_Paz
            - Atlantic/Stanley
            - America/Campo_Grande
            - America/Goose_Bay
            - America/Glace_Bay
            - America/St_Johns
            - America/Araguaina
            - America/Montevideo
            - America/Miquelon
            - America/Godthab
            - America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires
            - America/Sao_Paulo
            - America/Noronha
            - Atlantic/Cape_Verde
            - Atlantic/Azores
            - Europe/Belfast
            - Europe/Dublin
            - Europe/Lisbon
            - Europe/London
            - Africa/Abidjan
            - Europe/Amsterdam
            - Europe/Belgrade
            - Europe/Brussels
            - Africa/Algiers
            - Africa/Windhoek
            - Asia/Beirut
            - Africa/Cairo
            - Asia/Gaza
            - Africa/Blantyre
            - Asia/Jerusalem
            - Europe/Minsk
            - Asia/Damascus
            - Europe/Moscow
            - Africa/Addis_Ababa
            - Asia/Tehran
            - Asia/Dubai
            - Asia/Yerevan
            - Asia/Kabul
            - Asia/Yekaterinburg
            - Asia/Tashkent
            - Asia/Kolkata
            - Asia/Katmandu
            - Asia/Dhaka
            - Asia/Novosibirsk
            - Asia/Rangoon
            - Asia/Bangkok
            - Asia/Krasnoyarsk
            - Asia/Hong_Kong
            - Asia/Irkutsk
            - Australia/Perth
            - Australia/Eucla
            - Asia/Tokyo
            - Asia/Seoul
            - Asia/Yakutsk
            - Australia/Adelaide
            - Australia/Darwin
            - Australia/Brisbane
            - Australia/Hobart
            - Asia/Vladivostok
            - Australia/Lord_Howe
            - Etc/GMT-11
            - Asia/Magadan
            - Pacific/Norfolk
            - Asia/Anadyr
            - Pacific/Auckland
            - Etc/GMT-12
            - Pacific/Chatham
            - Pacific/Tongatapu
            - Pacific/Kiritimati
          type: string
        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        nostop:
          description: If the message is not for commercial purposes, you can request to withdraw the obligation from the STOP. Once your request has been validated by our services, you can remove the STOP SMS mention by adding nostop = "1"
          type: string
        num:
          items:
            description: Telephone numbers in national (example 0680010203) or international format (example 33680010203)
            type: string
          type: array
        numAzur:
          enum:
            - "1"
          type: string
        repertoireId:
          description: Directory ID
          type: string
        sms:
          items:
            description: Message to send to recipients. There can be a single message or 1 message per different recipient.
            type: string
          type: array
        smslong:
          description: 'The long SMS allows you to exceed the limit of 160 characters by sending a message consisting of several SMS. Up to 6 concatenated SMS can be sent for a maximum total length of 918 characters per message. For technical reasons, the limit per concatenated SMS is 153 characters. If the transmitter is changed, consider the automatic addition of 12 characters of the "STOP SMS". To send a smslong, you must add the smslong parameter to the calls. The value of SMS must be the maximum number of concatenated SMS allowed. In order not to get this error message and to obtain a dynamic calculation of the number of SMS then you must enter smslong = "999" '
          type: string
        tracker:
          items:
            description: "The tracker must be an alphanumeric string of less than 50 characters. This tracker will then be returned as a parameter of the urls for the return of acknowledgments."
            type: string
          type: array
        ucs2:
          description: It is also possible to send SMS in non-Latin alphabet (Russian, Chinese, Arabic, etc.) to numbers outside mainland France. To do this, the request should be encoded in UTF-8 format and contain the argument ucs2 = "1" Due to technical constraints, 1 single SMS cannot exceed 70 characters (instead of the usual 160) and in the case long SMS, each SMS cannot exceed 67 characters.
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - num
        - sms
      type: object
    ShortlinkRequest:
      properties:
        keyid:
          type: string
        shortlink:
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - shortlink
      type: object
    ShortlinkResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          properties:
            etat:
              items:
                properties:
                  code:
                    type: number
                  message:
                    type: string
                  shortlink:
                    type: string
                type: object
              type: array
          type: object
      type: object
    SmsUniqueRequest:
      example:
        emetteur: iSendPro
        keyid: YOUR_KEYID
        num: "0600123456"
        sms: Good morning! Welcome to iSendPro!
      properties:
        date_envoi:
          description: "Date sent in YYYY-MM-DD format hh: mm. This parameter is optional, if it is omitted, the sending is carried out immediately."
          type: string
        emetteur:
          description: |
            - The sender must be an alphanumeric string between 4 and 11 characters long.

            - The accepted characters are numbers between 0 and 9, letters between A and Z and space.

            - It cannot consist of only numbers.

            - For the modification of the transmitter and within the framework of commercial campaigns, the operators contractually impose to add at the end of the message the text "STOP XXXXX". As a result, the message sent cannot exceed a length of 148 characters instead of 160 characters, the "STOP" being added automatically.
          type: string
        gmt_zone:
          description: Fuseau horaire de la date d'envoi
          enum:
            - Pacific/Midway
            - America/Adak
            - Etc/GMT+10
            - Pacific/Marquesas
            - Pacific/Gambier
            - America/Anchorage
            - America/Ensenada
            - Etc/GMT+8
            - America/Los_Angeles
            - America/Denver
            - America/Chihuahua
            - America/Dawson_Creek
            - America/Belize
            - America/Cancun
            - Chile/EasterIsland
            - America/Chicago
            - America/New_York
            - America/Havana
            - America/Bogota
            - America/Caracas
            - America/Santiago
            - America/La_Paz
            - Atlantic/Stanley
            - America/Campo_Grande
            - America/Goose_Bay
            - America/Glace_Bay
            - America/St_Johns
            - America/Araguaina
            - America/Montevideo
            - America/Miquelon
            - America/Godthab
            - America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires
            - America/Sao_Paulo
            - America/Noronha
            - Atlantic/Cape_Verde
            - Atlantic/Azores
            - Europe/Belfast
            - Europe/Dublin
            - Europe/Lisbon
            - Europe/London
            - Africa/Abidjan
            - Europe/Amsterdam
            - Europe/Belgrade
            - Europe/Brussels
            - Africa/Algiers
            - Africa/Windhoek
            - Asia/Beirut
            - Africa/Cairo
            - Asia/Gaza
            - Africa/Blantyre
            - Asia/Jerusalem
            - Europe/Minsk
            - Asia/Damascus
            - Europe/Moscow
            - Africa/Addis_Ababa
            - Asia/Tehran
            - Asia/Dubai
            - Asia/Yerevan
            - Asia/Kabul
            - Asia/Yekaterinburg
            - Asia/Tashkent
            - Asia/Kolkata
            - Asia/Katmandu
            - Asia/Dhaka
            - Asia/Novosibirsk
            - Asia/Rangoon
            - Asia/Bangkok
            - Asia/Krasnoyarsk
            - Asia/Hong_Kong
            - Asia/Irkutsk
            - Australia/Perth
            - Australia/Eucla
            - Asia/Tokyo
            - Asia/Seoul
            - Asia/Yakutsk
            - Australia/Adelaide
            - Australia/Darwin
            - Australia/Brisbane
            - Australia/Hobart
            - Asia/Vladivostok
            - Australia/Lord_Howe
            - Etc/GMT-11
            - Asia/Magadan
            - Pacific/Norfolk
            - Asia/Anadyr
            - Pacific/Auckland
            - Etc/GMT-12
            - Pacific/Chatham
            - Pacific/Tongatapu
            - Pacific/Kiritimati
          type: string
        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        nostop:
          description: If the message is not for commercial purposes, you can request to withdraw the obligation from the STOP. Once your request has been validated by our services, you can remove the STOP SMS mention by adding nostop = "1"
          type: string
        num:
          description: Telephone number in national (example 0680010203) or international (example 33680010203) format
          type: string
        numAzur:
          enum:
            - "1"
          type: string
        sms:
          description: Message to send to recipients. The message must be encoded in utf-8 format and contain only characters existing in the GSM alphabet. It is also possible to send (abroad only) SMS in UCS-2, see parameter ucs2 for more details.
          type: string
        smslong:
          description: |
            The long SMS allows you to exceed the limit of 160 characters by sending a message consisting of
            of several SMS.
            Up to 6 concatenated SMS can be sent for a maximum total length of 918
            characters per message.
            For technical reasons, the limit per concatenated SMS is 153 characters.
            If the transmitter is changed, consider the automatic addition of 12 characters
            of the "STOP SMS".
            To send a smslong, you must add the smslong parameter to the calls. The value of SMS must be the maximum number of concatenated SMS allowed. In order not to have this error message and to obtain a dynamic calculation of the number of SMS then you must enter smslong = "999"
          type: string
        tracker:
          description: "Le tracker doit être une chaine alphanumérique de moins de 50 caractères. Ce tracker sera ensuite renvoyé en paramètre des urls pour les retours des accusés de réception. "
          type: string
        ucs2:
          description: |
            It is also possible to send SMS in non-Latin alphabet (Russian, Chinese, Arabic, etc.) on 
            numbers outside mainland France.
            To do this, the request should be encoded in UTF-8 format and contain the argument ucs2 = "1"
            Due to technical constraints, 1 unique SMS cannot exceed 70 characters (instead of
            the usual 160) and in the case of long SMS, each SMS cannot exceed 67 characters.
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - num
        - sms
      type: object
    SubaccountAddRequest:
      properties:
        keyid:
          type: string
        subAccountEdit:
          enum:
            - addAccount
          type: string
        subAccountLogin:
          type: string
        subAccountPassword:
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - subAccountEdit
        - subAccountLogin
        - subAccountPassword
      type: object
    SubaccountAddResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          properties:
            etat:
              items:
                properties:
                  code:
                    type: number
                  message:
                    type: string
                  subAccountId:
                    type: string
                  subAccountKeyId:
                    type: string
                  subAccountLogin:
                    type: string
                type: object
              type: array
          type: object
      type: object
    SubaccountRequest:
      properties:
        keyid:
          description: API key
          type: string
        subAccountAddCredit:
          description: Amount of credit to add
          type: string
        subAccountCountryCode:
          type: string
        subAccountEdit:
          description: Action to be carried out either setPrice to define a price or addCredit to add credit or setRestriction to modify the restriction stop.
          enum:
            - setPrice
            - addCredit
            - setRestriction
          type: string
        subAccountKeyId:
          description: sub-account key ID
          type: string
        subAccountPrice:
          type: string
        subAccountRestrictionStop:
          enum:
            - "0"
            - "1"
          type: string
        subAccountRestrictionTime:
          enum:
            - "0"
            - "1"
          type: string
      required:
        - keyid
        - subAccountEdit
      type: object
    SubaccountResponse:
      properties:
        etat:
          properties:
            etat:
              items:
                properties:
                  code:
                    type: string
                  message:
                    type: string
                  subAccountId:
                    type: string
                  subAccountKeyid:
                    type: string
                type: object
              type: array
          type: object
      type: object
